## Project-Specific Rules
- The ComfyUI Qwen3_VQA custom node stores its models in ComfyUI's models/prompt_generator folder, not in the HuggingFace cache.- The ComfyUI Qwen3_VQA custom node stores its models in ComfyUI's models/prompt_generator folder, not in the HuggingFace cache.
- While the main Goal is windows here, crate a Comment TODO: Linux Impelmentation for Task X in the code. Also make sure it is open to extension to the Linux Impelmentation
